column.name: CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: This is the logical foreign key to the Customer associated with the Mailing.

column.name: MAILING_ID
column.comment: This column`s data contains a unique system defined identifier for the Mailing

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: This is the date the Mailing is effective. This can be the current date or futured dated.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: DOCUMENT_TYPE_RD
column.comment: This column`s data specifies the type of documents sent to the DocumentRecipients. The type can be bill documents (invoices) or non bill documents (contracts, correspondences, etc.).

column.name: NAME
column.comment: This column is a free form text field where a Customer specifies a unique name for a Mailing.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: This is the status (Active or Deact) of the instance of the Mailing.

column.name: TABLE_OF_CONTENTS_INDICATOR
column.comment: This column stores a free form text field where a Customer specifies a unique name for a Mailing.

column.name: MARKETING_INFORMATION_IND
column.comment: This column stores a yes/no indicator specifying whether or not the bill documents derived from the Mailing can contain marketing information from outside Arcor.

column.name: PRIMARY_DOCUMENT_RECIPIENT_ID
column.comment: This is the primary Document Recipient to receive document produced

column.name: PRINTER_DESTINATION_RD
column.comment: This colum is populated with the printer destination ID designated  for the local printer or the batch print service provider. This attrib  ute  only applies to MAILINGs that have DOCUMENT PATTERNs that have an  output device specifying printer.

column.name: VERIFICATION_COUNTER_VALUE
column.comment: The actor sets the verification counter to select the number of Cycles  a test bill document will be created for.The actor may set the Verific  ation  Counter to determine how long test bills will be created for a  mailing.

column.name: VERIFICATION_START_DATE
column.comment: This is used to indicate when to start verification of test bill  documents.

column.name: ENCRYPTION_KEY
column.comment: This encryption key is required if Document Patterns or Invoice  Patterns associated with a Mailing have an electronic output device.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is  incremented on each update.  Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the  number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.

column.name: CYCLE_NAME
column.comment: The name of the related cycle
